title: september 21: the mysterious existence of Stonehenge
description:
As much as we love facts and history on this podcast, we’re always down for a good alien conspiracy theory. On today’s episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia does a deep dive on the many theories surrounding the prehistoric Stonehenge - including the extraterrestrial ones - and the many times it was bought and resold by British royalty. Speaking of expensive purchases and British legends, we’ll also hear about the auction that sold one of The Beatles’ contracts for a pretty penny, and the cultural significance surrounding that contract. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
